ru.sugarbaron_bicycles.library.synchronization

Class Semaphore

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.sugarbaron_bicycles.library.synchronization.Semaphore

  • public final class Semaphore
extends java.lang.Object
    wrap for #java.util.concurrent.Semaphore with handling of interruption while waiting for semaphore releasing
